question: How do I meet the pastors?
answer: To book an appointment with a pastor, give us a call or send a message. Someone from our office will respond shortly.

question: Is FEM Family Church affiliated with Faith Evangelistic Ministry?
answer: Yes! FEM Family Church Mombasa is a branch of Faith Evangelistic Ministry founded by Reverend Teresa Wairimu.

question: Can I come with my kids to church?
answer: Absolutely! We have a vibrant children's church that meets every Sunday. Our Sunday School teachers guide our children through a Bible-based lesson each week.

question: Do you have online services?
answer: We sure do! You can watch us live every Sunday morning from 9:30 AM on our Facebook page. You can also watch past sermons on our YouTube channel.

question: Is there a dress code?
answer: None at all! You can come to church just as you are.
